page.title: 08HOUSING 1 LIVINGSTON SOUTH
page.content: We carried out a survey in square 03060665 with seventeen pupils from {Williamston Primary}which caters for {Murieston}and{Easter Bankton}housing estates.We found that the most popular types of housing are terraced and bungalows.These houses are all privately owned.The average number of rooms is seven,the average number of people living in them is four.{Bankton {Glade}is also in this area.A group of people formed themselves into a self build housing cooperative which gave them the status of a Limited Company and Charity.They were then able to buy a site from the{Livingston Development {Corporation}at a price fixed by the {Disrict Valuer.}Torwood Homes supplied and erected twelve kit houses for them.A sub-contractor laid drains, roads and footpaths.Normally such a group do all the work themselves.
